title: Cooking Calculator — Scale Recipes, Convert Units, Estimate Roast Times

formulas.title: Formula (extracted text)
formulas.raw: Recipe scaling: $$q_{new} = q_{orig} \times \frac{S_{new}}{S_{orig}}$$ Mass–volume conversion with density: $$m = \rho \cdot V \quad\text{and}\quad V = \frac{m}{\rho}$$ where \( \rho \) is ingredient-specific (e.g., g/mL). Roast time (affine model): $$t = a \cdot w + b$$ where \(t\) is time, \(w\) is weight, \(a,b\) depend on meat type and oven. Convection typically reduces \(t\) by ~15–20%.
